response.original_title: 彼女デキた途端に3秒だけ挿入OK！ボクをヤキモチ誘惑してくる幼馴染とのショートタイムSEXが相性良すぎて何度も何度も射精させられてしまった…
response.overview: MIDV-787: "If it's only 3 seconds, it doesn't count as cheating!" As soon as I got a girlfriend, my tsundere childhood friend Mia got jealous and suddenly came after me with a mysterious rule! "You're still a virgin, right? It would be a shame for your girlfriend if you don't practice kissing and sex!" Mia claims to be experienced, and I have to deal with her every day, so our 3-second short-time sex that doesn't count as cheating escalates more and more! At first, I really thought it was just practice, but our compatibility was better than I thought... "If we follow the rules, it won't be cheating," I told myself desperately, but I also wanted 3 seconds, sex with Mia! We counted and climaxed many times, and the two of us made love and made love to each other. ___But was 3 seconds really that long?!
response.title: As soon as I got a girlfriend, I was allowed to insert for only 3 seconds! The short-time sex with my childhood friend who was jealous and tempting me was so good that I was made to ejaculate many times...
